QuestData.Title: Fate of the Stormstouts
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $r. I am Chen Stormstout.$b$bI'm looking for my family. I am told that several Stormstouts came across the wall to help face the mantid threat. I mean to find them, and join them.$b$bHave you seen anyone named Stormstout come through here? Would you mind helping me ask around?
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask the inhabitants of The Sunset Brewgarden if they've seen any Stormstouts.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Lya of Ten Songs
